full_title: Doctor (Work It Out) by Pharrell Williams & Miley Cyrus
title: Doctor (Work It Out)

description.plain:
“Doctor” was originally an unreleased song from Miley’s fourth studio album, Bangerz. The song first appeared online with the title “Doctor” on December 26, 2017 as a leak. The track was later revamped in 2023 and played as a soundtrack to Pharrell Williams’ menswear fall-winter show during Paris Fashion Week on January 16, 2024.

On February 27, 2024, Cyrus revealed the official single artwork.

body.plain:
“Doctor” was originally an unreleased song from Miley’s fourth studio album, Bangerz. The song first appeared online with the title “Doctor” on December 26, 2017 as a leak. The track was later revamped in 2023 and played as a soundtrack to Pharrell Williams’ menswear fall-winter show during Paris Fashion Week on January 16, 2024.

On February 27, 2024, Cyrus revealed the official single artwork.
